import React from 'react' import Nav from './Nav' import {Taka,Stars} from "./Components" import Navigation from './Navigation-ash' import {useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' const Reviewer = () => { let location = useLocation() let data = location.state console.log(data) return (

{data.name}

{data.story}

) } export default Reviewer
